title: 16x9.2014.03.29.A.Fathers.Justice.HDTV.x264-CLDD
description:
16x9.2014.03.29.A.Fathers.Justice.HDTV.x264-CLDD.mp4


A father's long search for justice - a search that would span four countries and take eight years - to unravel a possible conspiracy to kill. 

Then, how online porn may be damaging a generation of young men. 

And, finding the beauty in an ugly disease.





-----------------------------------------------

About 16x9

 
16x9Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ it's the aspect ratio for high-definition television with a bigger, better quality picture.

We chose the name 16x9 because we are committed to making a superior current affairs program, with better quality stories.

Chief Correspondent Carolyn Jarvis and our award-winning team of investigative reporters and producers uncover important stories that would otherwise remain hidden, and tell them the way important stories are meant to be told. We also find smaller stories, the ones that warm your heart as well as the ones that break it. And we tell all these stories the way they should be told, showing you the whole picture.

Every picture tells a story. The better the picture, the better the story. And it doesn't get better than 16x9.
